Font Awesome (Free) - Vendored Assets

This folder includes a copy of Font Awesome Free CSS + webfonts to avoid external
CDN dependencies in production (offline-friendly NUI).

License:
- Font Awesome Free (icons/fonts): https://fontawesome.com/license/free

Notes:
- Only static assets are vendored here (CSS + webfonts).
- No JS loaders or remote fetch logic is used.
